adventure.name: Achievement 1
adventure.desc:
Welcome to Greycat's Adventure, my totally original, well-coded and unhackable game! Can you obtain all the achievements?

Achievement 1 - Obtain a highscore of exactly 1337420.

adventure.name: Achievement 3
adventure.desc:
Welcome to Greycat's Adventure, my totally original, well-coded and unhackable game! Can you obtain all the achievements?

Achievement 3 - There is a secret hidden in the credits.

Just input the secret into the text field and click out of the text field to test your secret.

adventure.name: Timelock
adventure.desc:
Welcome to Greycat's Adventure, my totally original, well-coded and unhackable game! You will never get past my timelock! How can you wait for 50 hours in a 24-hour ctf!??

The flag is in all lower caps.

adventure.name: Vault

Welcome to Greycat's Adventure, my totally original, well-coded and unhackable game! Surely if I make it go by really fast nobody would be able to catch it...

The flag is in all lower caps.

blockchain.name: Escrow
blockchain.desc: Introducing NFT-based escrows - you can deposit assets and trade escrows by selling your ownership NFT! However, I accidentally renounced ownership for my own escrow. Can you help me recover the funds?

blockchain.name: Greyhats Dollar
blockchain.desc: Worried about inflation? Introducing GreyHats Dollar (GHD), the world's first currency with deflation built-in! Backed by GREY tokens, GHD will automatically deflate at a rate of 3% every year.

blockchain.name: Simple Amm Vault
blockchain.desc: ERC-4626 was too complex, so I made an AMM to swap between shares and assets.

blockchain.name: Voting Vault
blockchain.desc: In the spirit of decentralization, GreyHats is now a DAO! Vote with your GREY tokens to decide how our funds are spent.

crypto.name: Filter Ciphertext
crypto.desc:
I rolled my own crypto. What could go wrong?

This challenge unlocks 1 other cryptography challenge.

misc.name: All About Timing
misc.desc: I'm always late for class but my prof told me that time is relative

misc.name: Cashhat The Ripper
misc.desc: If only there was a way to crack password-protected zip files...

misc.name: Cats At The Beach
misc.desc:
I lost my grey cat when we were overseas.

This is the last picture I found of it, but I have no idea where it is. Can you help me identify this beach?

The flag format is grey{name_of_beach_in_lower_case}.

There is no word "beach" in the flag.

misc.name: Grey Divers
misc.desc:
Grey Cat has recently got into playing Hell Divers 2 before it disappeared and left this note behind:

    Eagle 500 Kg Bomb
    GL-21 Grenade Launcher
    MD-I4 Incendiary Mines
    Orbital Gas Strike
    Orbital Airburst Strike
    Eagle Rearm
    Eagle 110MM Rocket Pods

Can you decipher what it is trying to say?

misc.name: No More Tones
misc.desc:
No more tones for you! Just noise?

Warning: Audio file may be loud!

misc.name: Out In Plain Sight
misc.desc:
mp4 files are a good way to send hiden messages too!

@nus.greyhats

the md5 hash of the flag is 36ed337d208d4d58679cbb5047885236

PS. this is an osint challenge

misc.name: Tones
misc.desc:
What kind of music is this?

Warning: Audio file may be loud!

pwn.name: Baby Fmtstr
pwn.desc: With this new service, you can format your dates in any language

pwn.name: Baby Goods
pwn.desc: I have opened a new shop for baby goods! Feel free to explore around :)

pwn.name: Heap Heap Heap
pwn.desc: I heard you like heap, so I made a heap using a heap based heap!

pwn.name: Slingring Factory
pwn.desc: In following Greycat's adventures, you have stumbled upon a factory that produces weirdly-shaped rings. Upon closer inspection, you realise that the rings seem very familiar -- they looked exactly like the Sling Rings you saw from the Marvel Comics universe! Having some time leftover, you decide to explore the factory. Alas, you eventually come to realise that these Sling Rings were in fact not the same as those you knew: during forging, their destinations have to already be set. You wonder what you could do with these rings...

pwn.name: The Motorala
pwn.desc: i bet u wont guess my pin

pwn.name: The Motorala 2
pwn.desc: same source code, same bug, easy solve?

rev.name: Bees Password
rev.desc:
In the dance of bits and shadows, Bee's password lies veiled, guarded by the cryptic embrace of encryption. Amidst the digital whispers, a script and notes beckon. Can you, the seeker, unveil the clandestine secret encrypted within?

File: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-ESaCvrU8MZTeTClygXDPzAPCtlC3Ru_?usp=sharing

rev.name: Cooking Mama
rev.desc: im new to rust, so i cooked this :)

rev.desc:
finally... looks like a normal reversing challenge written in C... (or isit?)

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

rev.name: Pattern Enigma Matrix
rev.desc: I made this program that checks if the flag is correct. However, I forgot the flag.... Can you help me recover it?

rev.name: Phaser JS
rev.desc: I followed the phaserjs tutorial and made it a lot harder. Clear 10000000 waves and you will see the flag in the developer console (printed with console.log). Have fun :)

web.name: Baby Web
web.desc: I just learnt how to design my favourite flask webpage using htmx and bootstrap. I hope I don't accidentally expose my super secret flag.

web.name: Fearless Concurrency
web.desc: Rust is the most safest, fastest and bestest language to write web app! The code compiles, therefore it is impossible for bugs! PS: This is my first rust project (real) 🦀🦀🦀🦀🦀

web.name: Greyctf Survey
web.desc: Your honest feedback is appreciated :) (but if you give us a good rating we'll give you a flag)

web.name: Markdown Parser
web.desc: I built this simple markdown parser. Please give me some feedback (in markdown), I promise to read them all. Current features include: bold, italics, code blocks with syntax highlighting!

web.name: No Sql Injection
web.desc: I asked My friend Jason to build me a new e-commerce website. We just finished the login system and there's already bugs 🤦
